mapper.select: SELECT ttoi.tmt_ord_idx , ttoi.tmt_pp_etc , ttoi.tmt_size_json , ttoi.tmt_total_cnt , ttoi.ship_memo , ttoi.cash_recpt_num , ttoi.deposit_yn , ttoi.deposit_dt , ttoi.sales_price , ttoi.note , ttoi.regist_dt , toi.orderer_idx , toi.orderer_nm , toi.orderer_mobile , tri.receiver_idx , tri.receiver_nm , tri.receiver_mobile , tri.receiver_adr , tri.receiver_detail_adr , tri.receiver_zipcode , tii.invoice_idx , tii.tmt_box_cnt , tii.waybill_num , tii.shipping_fee , tii.ship_dt , FN_CODE_NM(ttoi.tmt_pp_cd) AS tmtQlt , FN_CODE_NM(JSON_EXTRACT(ttoi.tmt_size_json, '$[0].size')) AS tmtOrderSize FROM tb_invoice_info tii LEFT JOIN tb_tomato_order_info ttoi ON tii.tmt_ord_idx = ttoi.tmt_ord_idx LEFT JOIN tb_orderer_info toi ON ttoi.orderer_idx = toi.orderer_idx LEFT JOIN tb_receiver_info tri ON tri.receiver_idx = ttoi.receiver_idx ORDER BY ttoi.tmt_ord_idx
